In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vigilant Yaksha" [[Xiao]] ({{Anemo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Kätzlein Cocktail" [[Diona]] ({{Cryo}}), "Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean" [[Beidou]] ({{Electro}}), and "Blazing Riff" [[Xinyan]] ({{Pyro}}) will have their Wish drop rates greatly increased!

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
